title: Watch Tools For Android Wear
summary: Handy tools on your watch, remotely control your phone to do many things.

Beijing, China

Install and run the app 'WearWatchTools' on your Phone and Watch2. Touch the button on your Phone screen which you want to config, then select the action 3. Press the button on your watch to take the actionWe have just released the first full feature 'File Manager for Android Wear', you can find it here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.woiapp.filemanagerwear(Special Notes for Install: Watch App install takes extra time, so please wait about 20s ~ 1minute after phone install App complete.)
descriptionHTML:
Handy tools on your watch, run natively on your watch with an App Launcher, control your phone to make phone call, send SMS, record audio, take photos and many other things.

Watch Controls:
* Change Watch Brightness
* App Launcher

Remote Control Your Phone or Tablet to:
* Take Photo
* Record audio and play the last record audio
* Make phone call
* Send SMS
* Turn Flashlight on / off
* Change music/ring/notification volume
* Make your phone vibrate
* Find your phone by Sound and Vibrate
* GPS Toggle ( Only available for some devices )

(This is the Android Wear version of our 'Pebble Tools')
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xuecs.PebbleToolsPro

Steps:
1. Install and run the app 'WearWatchTools' on your Phone and Watch
2. Touch the button on your Phone screen which you want to config, then select the action
3. Press the button on your watch to take the action

We have just released the first full feature 'File Manager for Android Wear', you can find it here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.woiapp.filemanagerwear

(Special Notes for Install: Watch App install takes extra time, so please wait about 20s ~ 1minute after phone install App complete.)
comments: Not powerful enough... I expected to be able to assign screen swipes and button presses to directly control my office phone with it, unfortunately your limited to a short list of predetermined interactions...
recentChanges: * New App Launcher on Main UI
* Now we have all the actions on the Watch.
